pr_title: Add support for flexible transit routing

timeline.message: Find flex locations when splitting streets for access/egress
Fix accesses within no through traffic area

timeline.bodyText: Move the mapping to a Mapper class under the RoutingWorker, and rename this class to something like NearByStop.
timeline.author: t2gran

timeline.bodyText: Rename parameters to fromStopIndex, toStopIndex
timeline.author: t2gran

timeline.message:
Rename StopAtDistance NearbyStop

Also move mapping code to AccessEgressMapper

improve DistanceCalculator

- rename from and to indext to stop index
- rename DistanceAndDuration to FlexPath
- rename getDuration to calculateFlexPath
- rename DistanceCalculator FlexPathCalculator
- fix potential NPE in StreetDistanceCalculator
Prefix continuous stop flags with flex
Rename FlexServicesOnDate to FlexServiceDate and use it deeper
Do not pass in the whole request to FlexRouter

timeline.bodyText: Put this in org.opentripplanner.routing.algorithm.raptor.transit
timeline.author: hannesj

timeline.bodyText: Paralellize? Collect vertices and add afterwards
timeline.author: hannesj

timeline.bodyText: Move this up
timeline.author: hannesj

timeline.bodyText: Add javadoc for the fields
timeline.author: hannesj

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/ext/java/org/opentripplanner/ext/flex/FlexServiceDate.java b/src/ext/java/org/opentripplanner/ext/flex/FlexServiceDate.java
index ee219207a..e8289c1fe 100644
--- a/src/ext/java/org/opentripplanner/ext/flex/FlexServiceDate.java
+++ b/src/ext/java/org/opentripplanner/ext/flex/FlexServiceDate.java

@@ -5,9 +5,22 @@ import org.opentripplanner.ext.flex.trip.FlexTrip;
 import org.opentripplanner.model.calendar.ServiceDate;
 import org.opentripplanner.routing.graph.Graph;
 
+/**
+ * This class contains information used in a flex router, and depends on the date the search was
+ * made on.
+ */
 public class FlexServiceDate {
+
+  /** The local date */
   public final ServiceDate serviceDate;
+
+  /**
+   * How many seconds does this date's "midnight" (12 hours before noon) differ from the "midnight"
+   * of the date for the search.
+   * */
   public final int secondsFromStartOfTime;
+
+  /** Which services are running on the date.*/
   public final TIntSet servicesRunning;
 
   FlexServiceDate(

timeline.bodyText: Add Javadoc to all these methods, why are they different in access/egress
timeline.author: hannesj

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/ext/java/org/opentripplanner/ext/flex/template/FlexAccessEgressTemplate.java b/src/ext/java/org/opentripplanner/ext/flex/template/FlexAccessEgressTemplate.java
index 30b5e1e8a..61e295d41 100644
--- a/src/ext/java/org/opentripplanner/ext/flex/template/FlexAccessEgressTemplate.java
+++ b/src/ext/java/org/opentripplanner/ext/flex/template/FlexAccessEgressTemplate.java

@@ -58,18 +58,41 @@ public abstract class FlexAccessEgressTemplate {
     return trip;
   }
 
+  /**
+   * Get a list of edges used for transferring to and from the scheduled transit network. The edges
+   * should be in the order of traversal of the state in the NearbyStop
+   * */
   abstract protected List<Edge> getTransferEdges(SimpleTransfer simpleTransfer);
 
+  /**
+   * Get the {@Link Stop} where the connection to the scheduled transit network is made.
+   */
   abstract protected Stop getFinalStop(SimpleTransfer simpleTransfer);
 
+  /**
+   * Get the transfers to/from stops in the scheduled transit network from the beginning/end of the
+   * flex ride for the access/egress.
+   */
   abstract protected Collection<SimpleTransfer> getTransfersFromTransferStop(Graph graph);
 
+  /**
+   * Get the {@Link Vertex} where the flex ride ends/begins for the access/egress.
+   */
   abstract protected Vertex getFlexVertex(Edge edge);
 
+  /**
+   * Get the times in seconds, before during and after the flex ride.
+   */
   abstract protected int[] getFlexTimes(FlexTripEdge flexEdge, State state);
 
+  /**
+   * Get the FlexTripEdge for the flex ride.
+   */
   abstract protected FlexTripEdge getFlexEdge(Vertex flexFromVertex, StopLocation transferStop);
 
+  /**
+   * Checks whether the routing is possible
+   */
   abstract protected boolean isRouteable(Vertex flexVertex);
 
   public Stream<FlexAccessEgress> createFlexAccessEgressStream(Graph graph) {
